Name: Voix op. 17
Notes: Three melodies for countertenor or mezzo-soprano and piano inspired by the poem Tabacaria (The Tobacco Shop) of Fernando Pessoa.
Long Description: Three melodies for countertenor or mezzo-soprano and piano inspired by the poem Tabacaria (The Tobacco Shop) of Fernando Pessoa.
Short Description: Three melodies for countertenor or mezzo-soprano and piano inspired by the poem Tabacaria (The Tobacco Shop) of Fernando Pessoa.
